org.dsa.iot.dslink.serializer

Class SerializationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.serializer.SerializationManager

  • public class SerializationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles automatic serialization and deserialization.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SerializationManager(java.io.File file, NodeManager manager)
      Handles serialization based on the file path.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void deserialize()
      Deserializes the data into the node manager based on the path.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SerializationManager

        public SerializationManager(java.io.File file,
                            NodeManager manager)
        Handles serialization based on the file path.
        Parameters:
        file - Path that holds the data
        manager - Manager to deserialize/serialize

    • Method Detail

      • markChanged

        public void markChanged()

      • markChangedOverride

        public void markChangedOverride(boolean bool)

      • start

        public void start()

      • stop

        public void stop()

      • serialize

        public void serialize()
        Serializes the data from the node manager into the file based on the path. Manually calling this is redundant as a timer will automatically handle serialization.

      • deserialize

        public void deserialize()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Deserializes the data into the node manager based on the path.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - An error has occurred deserializing the nodes.
